original_title: The Royal Hunt of the Sun
overview: The Spanish explorer Pizarro captures the Inca god-chief Atahualpa and promises to free him upon the delivery of a hoard of gold. But Pizarro finds himself torn between his desire for conquest and his sense of honor after friendship and respect develops between captive and captor.
tagline: The birth of a hero. The death of an empire. The adventure of a lifetime.
title: The Royal Hunt of the Sun
